pageProduct.name: Vagisil Intimate Wash Sensitive 240ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Specially formulated for sensitive intimate skin.

Your intimate are is sensitive, so it's important to use products that are gentle and non-irritating. But, if you have sesnitive skin, you need more.

We'll help you find the right product for you:

Vagisil Soothing Oatmeal Cream

Soothes and protects sensitive intimate skin. Vagisil Soothing Oatmeal Cream is specifically formulated for sensitive intimate skin.

Vagisil Sensitive Intimate Wash

Get all-day freshness without irritation. Vagisil Sensitive Intimate Wash is especially designed for the unique needs of sensitive intimate skin. Gentle enough for daily use.

General Information

Vagisil Sensitive Intimate Wash is gentle and non-irritating for sensitive intimate skin.

Your intimate area is sensitive, so it's important to use a wash that is gentle and non-irritating. But if you have sensitive skin, you need more. Vagisil Sensitive Daily Intimate Wash is especially designed for the unique needs of sensitive intimate skin. It is free from soaps, dyes, parabens and sulphates and is infused with a natural botanical scent. Scientifically tested on women and sensitive intimate skin to gently cleanse sensitive intimate skin.

Size: 240mL

KEY FEATURES

• Gentle & non-irritating formula.
• No soaps, dyes, parabens and sulphates.
• Natural botanical scent.
• Scientifically tested on women and sensitive intimate skin.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse eyes with water. Keep out of reach of children

Ingredients

Water , Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Polysorbate 80, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Lauryl Glucoside, Glycol Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate , Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides , PEG-8, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Polyquaternium-10, Stearamide AMP, Sodium Benzoate, Salicylic Acid, Lactic Acid, Fragrance

Directions

Pour into hand or washcloth and apply. Rinse thoroughly.
